#include <iostream>
#include <cmath>	// sqrt
#include <cstring> 	// memset
using namespace std;

int primes[79000];
int bprime[1000001];

inline void genprime()
{
//	memset(primes,0,sizeof(primes));
	memset(bprime,0,sizeof(bprime));
	
	for(int i = 2; i <= sqrt(1000000); i++)
	{
		if(bprime[i] == 0)
		{
			for(int j = 2; j*i < 1000000; j++)
			{
				bprime[i*j] = 1;
			}
		}
	}
	
	bprime[0] = 1, bprime[1] = 1;
	
}
int main()
{
	
	genprime();	
	
 	for(int i = 0,j = 0; i < 1000001; i++)
		if(bprime[i] == 0 && j < 79000)
		{
			primes[j] = i;
			j++;
		}
	
	int T; cin >> T;
	while(T--)
	{
		int N; cin >> N;
		int flag = 0, pos = 0;
		for(pos = 0; pos < 79000; pos++)
		{
			if(primes[pos] == N)
			{
				flag = 1;
				break;
			}else if(primes[pos] > N)
				break;
		}
		
		cout << ((flag == 1) ? pos+1 : -1 ) << endl;
	}
	
 	
	
	return 0;
	
}//end main
